1. Compare the records of each coach by looking at their conference record (conference_record) within the specified time period. In this table, each coach has a row with a "conference record" column that lists their conference wins and losses during their coaching tenure.
2. Find the row corresponding to Walter Meanwell's coaching years: rows 2 & 5. Summarize his conference record by adding up his wins (63) and losses (9). This gives us a total of 72 conference wins for Walter Meanwell.
3. Find the row corresponding to Stan Van Gundy's coaching years: rows 12 & 13. Summarize his conference record by adding up his wins (7) and losses (11). This gives us a total of 8 conference wins for Stan Van Gundy.
4. Compare the conference records of Walter Meanwell and Stan Van Gundy: 72 > 8.
5. Since Walter Meanwell's conference record is greater than Stan Van Gundy's, it can be concluded that "Walter Meanwell 's conference record is better than that of Stan Van Gundy".
